items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent active users without performance degradation.

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to create and manage shared boards for organizing tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a board and invite team members via email.
All invited members can add, edit, and delete tasks on the board.
non_functional: Board loading time must be under 3 seconds.
Ensure data consistency across all members' views.

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made include the need for real-time updates and shared boards as core collaboration features.
